attributes.action: name and shame absent parents who avoid paying maintainence for their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are far too many absent parents not paying maintainence for their children. It is about time that something was done about it. There should be a national database accessable to the general public, employers and government. Parents that continuously avoid the financial responsibility of their children should be held accountable. Stronger punshiments should be enforced such as electronic tagging.
